name: jschardet
description: Character encoding auto-detection in JavaScript (port of python's chardet)
author: AntÃ³nio Afonso

scripts.dist-dev: mkdir -p dist && browserify index.js -s jschardet --detect-globals false -o dist/jschardet.js && ./scripts/show-size-changes.sh dist/jschardet.js
scripts.dist: npm run dist-dev && java -jar node_modules/google-closure-compiler/compiler.jar --warning_level QUIET --compilation_level SIMPLE_OPTIMIZATIONS --language_in=ECMASCRIPT6_STRICT --language_out=ES5 --js dist/jschardet.js > dist/jschardet.min.js && ./scripts/show-size-changes.sh dist/jschardet.min.js
